data.title: Shipping Services - Life Sciences - Healthcare
data.meta_description: Unlike other shipping companies whose size might limit their flexibility, we create a solution to accommodate your individual needs.
data.text:
The Quality Management System (QMS) is structured to comply with the demanding ISO 9001:2015 standard, ensuring that business processes are closely monitored, assessed, and managed for continuous improvement. Mercury holds an ISO 9001:2015 certification, having completed the registration process with BSI as the official registrar. Incorporating ISO 9001:2015 standards into our operations is not just a certification but a reflection of our unwavering dedication to delivering top-quality services to our valued customers.

We are committed to upholding the highest standards of distribution, which is why we are proud to announce our pursuit of the World Health Organization (WHO) Good Distribution Practices (GDP) certification. We understand that both risks and opportunities can impact the quality of our services, and we proactively address them to maintain our focus on elevating customer satisfaction.
